LightningComponentBundle.description: Flow screen component to refresh the console tab and auto-navigate Previous or Next/Finish - By Eric Smith

property.name: navDirection
property.label: Navigation Direction (Default Next)
property.description: Input: Next, Forward, Previous or Back Output: BACK, NEXT or FINISH

property.name: skipRefresh
property.label: Skip Console Tab Refresh? (Default False)
property.description: Set to True to skip the console tab refresh step
